cleaned_text: Drug Testing At IMI Addiction Medicine(IMI-AM) we offer discreet and randomized drug and alcohol testing to help our patients stay on track with their recovery goals. We offer various methods of testing which can range from mouth swabs, urinalysis, and hair follicles. Through a partnership with a lab company, we have the capability of sending any result to be re-examined, with a capability of testing for over 100 substances, including: marijuana, opiates, cocaine, benzodiazepines, alcohol, and kratom. Whether you're concerned about yourself, a family member, or need to report to court services we work with our patients to design a customized testing schedule to help them achieve long-term recovery.
